metadata.dc:author: Cabo, H
Gallardo, H
Tzovanis, M C
Franco de Montes de Oca, N
metadata.dc:description: A case of generalized Erythrasma is reported. Reference to its denomination and etiology is made. His apparition in type II diabetics patients is analyzed. Therapeutics considerations of this disorder is made.
metadata.dc:title: Eritrasma generalizado.
[Generalized erythrasma].
